title: GitLab boosts productivity across teams with Claude Enterprise AI integration \ Anthropic

metadata.title: GitLab boosts productivity across teams with Claude Enterprise AI integration \ Anthropic
metadata.description: Discover how GitLab leverages Anthropic's Claude Enterprise to enhance productivity by 25-50%, streamline RFP responses, and improve content creation. Learn how AI is transforming workflows and fostering innovation in DevSecOps.
